author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: hot to breathe, let alone work. Well, let's get going. There's still
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: time to visit the outer stations."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon climbed in and Blalok started the vehicle. "I thought we'd take a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: jeep today," he said. "They aren't very pretty, but they get around." He
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: turned onto the surfaced road that ran down the hill toward the hospital
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: and the complex of red-roofed buildings clustered about it. "About those
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: flukes," he said. "You have any plans to get rid of them?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Not yet. I'll have to look the place over. There's more detective work
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: than medicine involved in this."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Detective work?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Sure--we know the criminal, but to squelch him we have to learn his
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: hangouts, study his modus operandi, and learn how to make his victims
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: secure from his activities. Unless we do that, we can treat individuals
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: from now to infinity and all we'll have is more cases. We have to apply
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: modern criminology tactics--eliminate the source of crime--stop up the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: soft spots. In other words, kill the flukes before they enter the Lani."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Old Doc never said anything about this," Blalok said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Probably he never knew about it. I was looking over the herd books last
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: night, and I saw nothing about trematodes, or anything that looked like
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: a parasite pattern until the last few months."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Why not?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "My guess is that he was one of the first deaths."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You mean this thing attacks human beings?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Preferentially," Kennon said. "It's strange, too, because it originated
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: on Santos so far as we know. In fact, some people think that the Varl
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: bred it for a weapon to use against us before we conquered them. They
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: could have done it. Their biological science was of a high enough
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: order."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But how did it get here?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I wouldn't know--unless you've hired a Santosian or someone else who
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: was affected."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "We did have a man from Santos. Fellow called Joe Kryla. We had to let
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: him go because he was a nudist. It made a bad impression on the Lani.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: But that was over a year ago."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That's about the right time to build up a good reservoir of infection.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: The fatal cases usually don't show up before an area is pretty well
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: seeded."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That's not so good."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Well, there's one thing in our favor. The Lani are pretty well
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: concentrated into groups. And so far there doesn't seem to be any
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: infestation outside of Hillside Station--except for two deaths in Lani
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: recently sent from there. If we quarantine those stations and work fast,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: may be we can stop this before it spreads all over the island."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That's fine, but what are you going to do now?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Treat those that show symptoms. There should be some Trematox capsules
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: at the hospital. If there aren't we'll get them. We'll take the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: sick ones back to the hospital area and push therapy and supportive
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: treatment. Now that we know the cause, we shouldn't have any more death
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: losses."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Old Doc didn't treat at the hospital," Blalok said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I'm not Old Doc."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But it's going to mess up our operations. We're using the ward
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: buildings to finish training the Lani scheduled for market."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Why?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It's convenient. Most of the ward space is filled right now." Blalok
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: said. There was a touch of disgust in his voice.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "They're well, aren't they?" Kennon demanded.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Of course."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Then get them out of there."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But I told you-"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You told me nothing. The hospital area is needed for something more
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: than a training center. Perhaps Old Doc was trained in outcall work, but
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: I'm not. I work from a hospital. The only things I do on outcalls are
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: diagnoses, vaccinations, and emergencies. The rest of the patients come
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: to the hospital."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "This isn't going to set well with Jordan and the division chiefs."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That's not my concern," Kennon said. "I run my business in the best way
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: possible. The patients are of more concern than the personal comfort of
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: any straw boss or administrator. You're the administrator--you calm them
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: down."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You have the authority," Blalok admitted. "But my advice to you is to
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: go slow."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I can't," Kennon said. "Not if we want to prevent any more losses.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: There simply won't be time to run all over the island dosing with
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Trematox and taking temperatures, and while that sort of thing is
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: routine, it should be supervised. Besides, you'll see the advantages of
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: this method. Soon enough."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I hope so," Blalok said as he braked the jeep to a stop in front of the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: hospital. "I suppose you'll want to take some things along."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "So I will," Kennon said. "I'll be back in a minute." Kennon slid from
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the seat, leaving Blalok looking peculiarly at his departing back.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: The minute stretched to nearly ten before Kennon returned followed by
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: two Lani carrying bags which they loaded into the back of the jeep.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I had to reorganize a little," Kennon apologized, "some things were
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: unfamiliar."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Plan on taking them?" Blalok said, jerking a thumb at the two Lani.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Not this time. I'm having them fit up an ambulance. They should be busy
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: most of the day."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Blalok grunted and started the turbine. He moved a lever and the jeep
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: floated off the ground.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "An airboat too," Kennon remarked. "I wondered why this rig was so
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: boxy."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It's a multipurpose vehicle," Blalok said. "We need them around here
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: for fast transport. Most of the roads aren't so good." He engaged the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: drive and the jeep began to move. "We'll go cross country," he said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Hillside's pretty far out--the farthest station since we abandoned
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Olympus."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: The air began whistling past the boxlike body of the jeep as Blalok
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: increased the power to the drive and set the machine on automatic.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "We'll get a pretty good cross-section of our operations on this trip,"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: he said over the whine of the turbine. "Look down there."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: They were passing across a series of fenced pastures and Kennon was
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: impressed. The size of this operation was beginning to sink in. It
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: hadn't looked so big from the substratosphere in Alexander's ship, but
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: down here close to the ground it was enormous. Fields of grain, wide
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: orchards, extensive gardens. Once they were forced to detour a huge
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: supply boat that rose heavily in front of them. Working in the fields
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: were dozens of brown-skinned Lani who paused to look up and wave as
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the jeep sped by. Occasional clusters of farm buildings and the low
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: barrackslike stations appeared and disappeared behind them.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "There's about twenty Lani at each of these stations," Blalok said,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "They work the farm area under the direction of the stationmaster."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "He's a farmer?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Of course. Usually he's a graduate of an agricultural school, but we
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: have a few who are descendants of the crew of the first Alexander, and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: there's one old codger who was actually with him during the conquest.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Most of our stationmasters are family men. We feel that a wife and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: children add to a man's stability--and incidentally keep him from
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: fooling around with the Lani."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: A series of fenced pastures containing hundreds of huge grayish-white
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: quadrupeds slipped past.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Cattle?" Kennon asked.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Yes--Earth strain. That's why they're so big. We also have sheep and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: swine, but you won't see them on this run."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Any native animals?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "A few--and some which are native to other worlds. But they're
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: luxury-trade items. The big sale items are beef, pork, and mutton."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Blalok chuckled. "Did you think that the Lani were our principal
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: export?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon nodded.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "They're only a drop in the bucket. Agriculture--Earth-style
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: agriculture--is our main source of income. The Lani are valuable
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: principally to keep down the cost of overhead. Virtually all of them
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: work right here on the island. We don't sell more than a hundred a year
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: less than five per cent of our total. And those are surplus--too light
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: or too delicate for farm work."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Where do you find a market for all this produce?" Kennon asked.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "There's two hundred million people here, and quite a few billion more
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: in space-train range. We can produce more cheaply than any competitor,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: and we can undersell any competition, even full automation." Blalok
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: chuckled. "There are some things that a computer can't do as well as
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: a human being, and one of them is farm the foods on which humanity is
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: accustomed to feed. A man'll pay two credits for a steak. He could get a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Chlorella substitute for half a credit, but he'll still buy the steak
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: if he can afford it. Same thing goes for fruit, vegetables, grain, and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: garden truck. Man's eating habits have only changed from necessity.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Those who can pay will still pay well for natural foods." Blalok
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: chuckled. "We've put quite a dent in the algae and synthetics operations
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: in this sector."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It's still a luxury trade," Kennon said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You've eaten synthetic," Blalok replied. "What do you prefer?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon had to agree that Blalok was right. He, too, liked the real thing
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: far better than its imitations.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "If it's this profitable, then why sell Lani?" Kennon asked.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It's the Family's idea. Actually--since the export type is surplus it
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: does us no harm. We keep enough for servants--and the others would be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: inefficient for most farm work. So disposal by sale is a logical and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: profitable way of culling. But now the Boss-man is being pressured into
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: breeding an export type. And this I don't like. It's too commercial.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Smells like slavery."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You're a Mystic, aren't you?" Kennon asked.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Sure--but that doesn't mean I like slavery. Oh, I know some of those
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: fatheaded Brotherhood economists call our system economic slavery--and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: I'll admit that it's pretty hard to crack out of a spherical trust.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: But that doesn't mean that we have to stay where we are. Mystics aren't
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: owned by their entrepreneurs. Sure, it's a tough haul to beat the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: boss, but it can be done. I did it, and others do it all the time. The
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: situation isn't hopeless."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But it is with the Lani," Kennon added.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Of course. That's why they should be protected. What chance does a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Lani have? Without us they can't even keep going as a race. They're
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: technological morons. They don't live long enough to understand modern
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: civilization. To turn those poor helpless humanoids out into human
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: society would be criminal. It's our duty to protect them even while
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: we're using them."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Man's burden?' Kennon said, repeating the old cliche.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Exactly." Blalok scowled. "I wish I had guts enough to give the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Boss-man the facts--but I can't get nerve enough to try. I've a good job
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: here--a wife and two kids--and I don't want to jeopardize my future."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Blalok glanced over the side. "Well, here we are," he said, and began
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: descending into the center of a spokelike mass of buildings radiating
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: outward from a central hub.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Hmm--big place," Kennon murmured.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It should be," Blalok replied. "It furnishes all of our Lani for
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: replacement and export. It can turn out over a thousand a year at
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: full capacity. Of course we don't run at that rate, or Flora would be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: overpopulated. But this is a big layout, like you said. It can maintain
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: a population of at least forty thousand. Old Alexander had big ideas."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I wonder what he planned to do with them?" Kennon said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I wouldn't know. The Old Man never took anyone into his confidence."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Jordan came up as the jeep settled to the ground. "Been expecting you
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: for the past half hour," he said. "Your office said you were on your
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: way.--Good to see you, too, Doc. I've been going over the records with
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Hank Allworth--the stationmaster here." Jordan held out his hand.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You're an Earthman, eh?" Kennon asked as he grasped the outstretched
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: hand. The gesture was as old as man, its ritualistic meaning lost in
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: antiquity.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "No--Marsborn--a neighbor world," Jordan said. "But our customs and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Earth's are the same."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You're a long way from home," Kennon said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "No farther than you, Doc." Jordan looked uncomfortable. "But we can
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: compare origins later. Right now, you'd better come into the office.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: I've run across something peculiar."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: CHAPTER IX
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "There are twelve bays to this station," Jordan said. "Under our present
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: setup two are used for breeding and the other ten for maturation. We
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: rotate the youngsters around the bay--a different bay each year until
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: they're age eleven. Then they're sorted according to type and sent out
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: for a year of further specialized training after which they go onto the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: farms, or to inhouse or export.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Now here's the peculiar part. There's no trouble in Bays One through
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Nine, but Bay Ten has had all our losses except two that have occurred
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: at the training stations."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That's good news," Kennon said. "Our parasite can't have had time to
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: migrate too far. We have him pinpointed unless--say how many training
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: centers are there?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Three," Jordan said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Quarantine them," Kennon replied. "Right now. Nothing goes in or out
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: until we've checked them and completed prophylaxis."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Jordan looked at Blalok inquiringly.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "He's the boss," Blalok said. "Do as you're told. This is his problem."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Why the quarantine?" Jordan asked.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I want to get any carriers. We can check them with antigen, and then
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: give Trematox."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "All that concentration in Bay Ten," Jordan said. "Does it mean
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: something?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Blalok said that there was a Santosian in your division."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Yeah--Joe Kryla--and come to think of it, he ran Bay Ten!"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That's a help--now let's see what makes that bay different from the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: others."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Why?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I'll tell you--but you may not understand," Kennon said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I'll take a chance."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon grinned. "All right, you asked for it. The parasite that's doing
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the damage is a flatworm, a trematode called Hepatodirus hominis. As
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: I've told Blalok, it's a tricky thing. Like all trematodes it has a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: three-stage life cycle, but unlike every other fluke, its life cycle is
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: not fixed to definite intermediate hosts. Depending upon where it is,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the fluke adapts. It still must pass through its life cycle, but its
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: intermediate host need not be one species of snail, fish, or copepod.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Any cold-blooded host will do. What you have here is a Kardonian variant
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: which has adapted to some particular intermediate host on this world.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Until now, its final host was either man or Varl. Now we have a third,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the Lani. And apparently they are the most susceptible of the three.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: It never kills Varl. And humans, while they're more susceptible, only
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: occasionally succumb, but the Lani appear to be the most susceptible of
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: all. I've never seen an infestation like those Lani had. Their livers
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: were literally crawling with flukes." Kennon paused and looked at
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Jordan. "You following me?" he asked.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Slowly and poorly," Jordan said. "You're assuming too much knowledge on
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: my part."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon chuckled. "You can't say I didn't warn you."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Well--I'm really interested in only one thing--how do you break the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: parasite up in business?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "There's only one sure way--and that's to break the life cycle. The
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: technique is thousands of years old, but it's just as good today as it
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: was then."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Good--then let's do it."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "To make a varrit stew," Kennon said, "one must first catch the varrit."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Huh?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "We have to learn the beastie's life cycle before we can break it,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: and like I said, it adapts. Its intermediate host can be any one of a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: hundred cold-blooded animals."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Is there no place else where it can be attacked?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Sure, in the body of the final host, or on its final encysting place.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: But that won't eliminate the bug."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Why not?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It'll still survive in its infective form and enough Lani will get
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: subacute dosage to propagate it until the time is right for another
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: epizootic. We have to kill its intermediate host--or hosts if it has
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: more than one. That will keep it from growing and will ultimately
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: eradicate it."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Judson scratched his head. "It sounds complicated."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It is. It's so complicated that once the fluke becomes well established
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: it's virtually impossible to eradicate."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "And you think it can be done here?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "We can give it the old college try. But it's going to take some
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: detective work."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Where do we start?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "With Bay Ten. We look it over real well. Then we check the diet and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: habits of the Lani. Then we check each individual Lani. Then we check
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the life cycle of the parasite. Somewhere along the line if we're lucky
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: we'll find a weak point that can be attacked."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That's a big order," Blalok said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It can't be helped. That's the way it is. Of course, we're lucky that
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: we're on an isolated land mass. That gives us an advantage. We should be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: able to clean this up."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "How long do you think it will take?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It depends on how well the fluke is established. Six months at the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: minimum--and I wouldn't care to guess at the maximum. However, I hope
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the minimum will be time enough."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "So do I," Blalok said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Well," Kennon said, "let's get on with it."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I hope it won't interrupt our program," Jordan said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Of course it will interrupt it," Kennon replied. "It can't help it. Get
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the idea in your head that you're facing something here that can cripple
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: you--maybe abort your whole operation. You have a choice--interrupt now
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: or abort later. And half measures won't work. To eradicate this pest
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: requires an all-out effort."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But I can't see why we can't merely bypass Bay Ten--" Jordan said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Take my word for it," Kennon said. "You can't. There's no accurate way
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: of telling how far this spreads until the death losses occur. Our tests
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: for fluke infestation aren't that good. We have to work thoroughly and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: carefully. We can't be butting heads over this--either we all co-operate
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: or this whole operation will blow up in our faces.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Look at the record. Six months ago you ended a year with no deaths from
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: disease. Five months ago Old Doc and two Lani were ill. Four months ago
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: one of the two Lani was dead and Old Doc was too ill to be effective.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Three months ago Old Doc and the other Lani were dead, and before the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: end of the month two more followed them. Two months ago six died, last
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: month eight, and so far this month you've lost four and you have over
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: two weeks to go. Up to now they've all been from here, but two this
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: month were at other stations. In six months if nothing is done, we'll
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: be having losses there unless we're lucky. And the losses will keep
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: on increasing. Apparently you don't know what it is to live with
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: parasites--so let me tell you. It isn't pleasant!"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Blalok shrugged. "You needn't get hot about it," he said. "After all,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: you're the Doc--and we'll co-operate."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Jordan nodded. "We will," he said. "All the way."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: CHAPTER X
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: There is a special providence that looks over recent veterinary
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: graduates, Kennon reflected as he checked the monthly reports from the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Stations. Since the time he had laid down the law to Judson and Blalok,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: he had had no trouble from the production staff. And for the past four
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: months there had been no further trouble with Hepatodirus. That unwanted
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: visitor had apparently been evicted. At that, they had been lucky. The
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: parasite had been concentrated at Hillside Station and had failed to
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: establish itself in the training area. The intermediate host, it had
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: turned out, was a small amphibian that was susceptible to commercial
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: insecticide. It had been no trouble to eradicate. Systemic treatment and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: cooking of all food had cleaned up the infective cercaria and individual
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: infections, and after six months of intensive search, quarantine, and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: investigation, Kennon was morally certain that the disease had been
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: eradicated. The last four reports confirmed his belief.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: He sighed as he leaned back in his chair. Blalok was at last convinced
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: that his ideas were right. The hospital was operating as a hospital
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: should, with a staff of twelve Lani kept busy checking the full wards.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Actually, it was working better than it should, since stationmasters all
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: over the island were now shipping in sick animals rather than treating
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: them or requesting outpatient service.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Hi, Doc," Blalok said as he pushed the door open and looked into the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: office. "You doing anything?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Not at the moment," Kennon said. "Something troubling you?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "No--just thought I'd drop in for a moment and congratulate you."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "For what?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "For surviving the first year."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That won't be for two months yet."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Blalok shook his head. "This is Kardon," he said. "There's only three
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: hundred and two days in our year, ten thirty-day months and two special
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: days at the year's end."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon shrugged. "My contract is Galactic Standard. I still have two
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: months to go. But how come the ten-month year? Most other planets have
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: twelve, regardless of the number of days."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Old Alexander liked thirty-day months."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I've wondered about that."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You'll find a lot more peculiar things about Flora when you get to know
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: her better. This year has just been a breaking-in period."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon chuckled. "It's damn near broken me," he admitted. "You know, I
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: thought that the Lani'd be my principal practice when I came here."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You didn't figure that right. They're the easiest part. They're
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: intelligent and co-operative."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Which is more than one can say about the others." Kennon wiped the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: sweat from his face. "What with this infernal heat and their eternal
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: stubbornness, I've nearly been driven crazy."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You shouldn't have laid out that vaccination program."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I had to. Your hog business was living mostly on luck, and the sheep
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: and shrakes were almost as bad. You can't get away from soil saprophytes
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: no matter how clean you are. Under a pasture setup there's always
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: a chance of contamination. And that old cliche about an ounce of
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: prevention is truer of livestock raising than anything else I can think
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: of."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I have some more good news for you," Blalok said. "That's why I came
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: over. We're going to have another species to treat and vaccinate."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon groaned. "Now what?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Poultry." Blalok's voice was disgusted. "Personally I think it's a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: mess, but Alexander thinks it's profitable. Someone's told him that
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: pound for pound chickens are the most efficient feed converters of all
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the domestic animals. So we're getting a pilot plant: eggs, incubator,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: and a knocked-down broiler battery so we can try the idea out.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: The Boss-man is always hot on new ideas to increase efficiency and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: production. The only trouble is that he fails to consider the work
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: involved in setting up another operation."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You're so right. I'll have to brush up on pullorum, ornithosis,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: coccidosis, leukosis, perosis, and Ochsner knows how many other-osises
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: and--itises. I was never too strong on fowl practice in school, and I'd
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: be happier if I never had anything to do with them."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "So would I," Blalok agreed. "I can't see anything in this but trouble."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon nodded.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "And he's forgotten something else," Blalok added. "Poultry need
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: concentrated feed. We're going to have to install a feed mill."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon chuckled. "I hope he'll appreciate the bill he gets."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "He thinks we can use local labor," Blalok said gloomily. "I wish he'd
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: realize that Lani are technological morons."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "They could learn."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I suppose so--but it isn't easy. And besides, Allworth is the only man
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: with feed-mill experience, and he's up to his ears with Hillside Station
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: since that expansion order came in."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I never did get the reason for that. After we complained about the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: slavery implications and got the Boss-man's okay to hold the line, why
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: do we need more Lani?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Didn't you know? His sister's finally decided to try marriage. Found
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: herself some overmuscled Halsite who looked good to her--but she
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: couldn't crack his moral barrier." Blalok grinned. "I thought you'd be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the first to know. Wasn't she interested in you?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon chuckled. "You could call it that. Interested--like the way a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: dog's interested in a beefsteak. It's a good thing we had that fluke
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: problem or I'd have been chewed up and digested long ago. That woman
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: frightens me."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I could be scared by uglier things," Blalok said. "With the Boss-man's
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: sister on my side I wouldn't worry."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "What makes you think she'd be on my side? She's a cannibal."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Well, you know her better than I do."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: CHAPTER XIV
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon was morally certain that the Lani were of human stock. Evolved,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: of course. Mutated. Genetic strangers to the rest of humanity. But
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: human. The spaceship and the redes proved it as far as he was concerned.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: But moral certainty and legal certainty were two different things. What
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: he believed might be good enough to hold up in a Brotherhood court, but
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: he doubted it. Ulf and Lyssa might be the founders of the Lani race, but
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: they had come to Kardon nearly four thousand years ago and no records
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: existed to prove that the Lani weren't here before they came. Redes
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: passed by word of mouth through hundreds of generations were not
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: evidence. Even the spaceship wasn't the absolute proof that would be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: needed to overturn the earlier legal decision. Other and better
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: proof was needed--something that would stand up in any court in the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Brotherhood. He hoped the spaceship would hold that proof.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: But Kennon's eagerness to find out what was inside the ancient spacer
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: was tempered by hard practicality. Too much depended on what he might
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: find inside that hull. Every step of the work must be documented beyond
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: any refutation. Some method of establishing date, time, and location had
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: to be prepared. There must be a record of every action. And that would
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: require equipment and planning. There must be no mistake that could be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: twisted by the skillful counsel that Alexander undoubtedly retained.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: He had no doubt that the Family would fight. Too much money and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: prestige were involved. To prove the Lani human would destroy Outworld
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Enterprises on Kardon. Yet this thought did not bother him. To his
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: surprise he had no qualms of conscience. He was perfectly willing to
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: violate his contract, break faith with his employers, and plot their
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: ruin. The higher duty came first--the duty to the human race.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: He smiled wryly. It wasn't all higher duty. There were some personal
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: desires that leavened the nobility. To prove Copper human was enough
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: motivation--actually it was better than his sense of duty. Events,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon reflected, cause a great deal of change in one's attitude.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Although not by nature a plotter, schemes had been flitting through his
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: mind with machinelike regularity, to be examined and discarded, or to be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: set aside for future reference.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: He rejected the direct approach. It was too dangerous, depended too much
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: on personalities, and had too little chance for success. He considered
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the possibility of letters to the Brotherhood Council but ultimately
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: rejected it. Not only was the proof legally insufficient to establish
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: humanity in the Lani, but he also remembered Alexander's incredible
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: knowledge of his activities, and there was no reason to suppose that
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: his present didn't receive the same scrutiny as the past. And if he,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: who hadn't written a letter in over a year, suddenly began to write, the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: probably be examined, and Dirac messages would be out for the same
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: reason.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: He could take a vacation and while he was away from the island he
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: could inform the Brotherhood. Leaving Flora wouldn't be particularly
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: difficult, but leaving Kardon would be virtually impossible. His
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: contract called for vacations, but it expressly provided that they would
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: be taken on Kardon. And again, there would be no assurance that his
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: activities would not be watched. In fact, it was probable that they
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: would be.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: There was nothing that could be done immediately. But there were certain
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: long-range measures that could be started. He could begin preparing a
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: would help him. The situation of the Lani was so close to Beta's own

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: attention to detail; the case, the evidence, everything would have to
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: be prepared with every safeguard and contingency provided, so that there
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: would not be the slightest chance of a slip-up once it came to court.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: And perhaps the best method of bringing the evidence would be to
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: transport it under its own power. The thought intrigued him. Actually it
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: wouldn't be too difficult. Externally the Egg wasn't in bad shape. The
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: virtually indestructible durilium hull was still intact. The controls
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: and the engines, hermetically sealed inside the hull, were probably as
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: good as the day they stopped running. The circuitry would undoubtedly be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: bad but it could be repaired and restored, and new fuel slugs could be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: obtained for the engine and the converter. But that was a problem for
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the future.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: The immediate problem was to get into the ship in a properly documented
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: fashion.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: It took nearly two months, but finally, under the impersonal lenses of
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: cameras and recorders, the entrance port of the God-Egg swung open and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: as he entered the black orifice in the spaceship's side. His handtorch
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: gave plenty of light for the recorders as he moved inside--Copper at his
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: heels, both of them physically unrecognizable in antiradiation suits.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Why are we moving so slowly?" Copper said. "Let's go ahead and find out

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: what's beyond this passageway."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "From a superstitious coward you've certainly become a reckless
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: explorer," he said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "The Egg hasn't hurt us, and we've been around it many times," she said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: in the first place. So let's see what is ahead. I'm curious."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: slowly. You know why."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But I want to see."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I'm bubbling over with it," Kennon admitted, "but I manage to keep it

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: under control."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You're cold-blooded."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: let us all down by being too eager, would you?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: to see."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: They moved cautiously through the airlock and into the control room.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Ah!" Kennon said with satisfaction. "I hoped for this, but I didn't
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: dare expect it."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "What?"

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Look around. What do you see?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Nothing but an empty room. It's shaped like half an orange, and it has
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: a lot of funny instruments and dials on the walls, and a video screen
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: overhead. But that's all. Why--what's so unusual about it? It looks just

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: cannibalize the instruments--and they didn't come back."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Copper drew back. "But you said it wouldn't hurt us--"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: came here, the whole shell could have been as hot as a Samarian summer."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: approach from the outside. And radioactivity cools off slowly. It might

text: there was no decontamination equipment available."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: entries resumed.

text: "But you needn't be. It's obviously--"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "It's been tried, my love--and those who were treated died. Man
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Alexander tried many years ago to make us long-lived like you. But he
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: failed. You see, he loved one of us too."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But--"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Let us think no more of it. Let us enjoy what we have and be grateful
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: to the Gods for the love we enjoy--or do you have any Gods?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "One."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Two are better. More, anyway. And besides, Ulf and Lyssa and the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: God-Egg are responsible for our joy."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "They are indeed," Kennon said.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Then why should you think of leaving the place where they rule? You
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: should stay here. There will be other Lani when I am gone. You will be
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: happy always."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Not without you," Kennon said. "Don't you understand that I love you?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "And I you. But I am a Lani. You are a man."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You're as human as I am," Kennon said abruptly.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "That is what you say," Copper replied. "I am not so sure. I need more
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: proof than this." She waved her hand at the ship.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "What proof do you need?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "The same as the proof you men require. If I should have your child,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: then I would believe that I was human."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I've told you a thousand times that the radiation on this ship must
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: have affected Ulf and Lyssa's germ plasm. Can't you understand that?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "I can understand it all right, but it does not change things. Ulf and
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Lyssa may have been human before they came here, but they were not when
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: they landed. They were Lani, and their children were Lani."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But they were of human stock."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "The law that lets men become our masters does not agree with you."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "Then the law is wrong. It should be changed."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Copper shrugged. "Two people cannot change a law."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "They can try--particularly if the law is unjust."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Copper sighed. "Is it not enough for us to love? Must you try to run
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: through a wall?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "When the wall stands in the way of right and justice I must."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Copper looked at him with pity in her green eyes. "This I do not
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: understand. I know nothing of right and justice. What are these things?
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Just words. Yet you will endanger our happiness for them. If it is my
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: happiness you wish--then leave this foolishness alone. I have fifteen
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: years I can live with you before I am old and you tire of me. With those
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: years I can be content."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "But I can't," Kennon said. "Call me selfish if you wish, but I want you
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: with me as long as I live. I don't want to live my life without you."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "You want too much," Copper said softly. "But if it makes you happy to
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: try to get it, I shall help. And if we do not succeed you will at least
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: be happier for trying. And if you are happy"--she shrugged--"then the
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: rest makes little difference."
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: That was the crux of the matter, Kennon reflected bitterly. He was
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: convinced she was human. She was not. And until her mind could be

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: it. And the only thing that would convince her that she was human would
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: be a child--a child of his begetting. He could perhaps trick her with
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: an artificial insemination of Lani sperm. There were drugs that could
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: actions were examined under psychoprobe, and a hypnotic was of no value

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: collected.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: He sighed. The only thing to do was to go on as they were--and hope that
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: the evidence would hold. With Betan legal talent at their back it
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: might. And, of course, they could try to produce a child as nature had
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: had.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: declared an animal, and you will not be allowed to change."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: revolt. For the Lani would no longer be dependent upon Men to survive.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: about these things."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: The Port Captain's face paled. "Why didn't you say something?" he said.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: bowed to Kennon and Smalley and stalked out of the office.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: professional rights?"

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: flushed a dull red.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: license." Kennon smiled. "Don't worry. I shan't report you."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: were difficult to erase--particularly ones of courtesy.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: car emblazoned with the three crosses, red, blue, and green, that

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: difference. Laymen often called me 'Doc.'"

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: Kennon liked the man instantly. A plump, pink-cheeked man of middle
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: age, with prematurely white hair, Dr. Will Brainard combined a fatherly
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: sheathed his stocky body had obviously not touched his mind. Brainard
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: rose from the deep chair near the window where he had been sitting,
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: knocked the ashes from his pipe, and bowed stiffly. His eyes--sharp
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: points of blue in the smooth pinkness of his face--surveyed Kennon
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: curiously.
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "So you're the young man who takes untrained pregnant women for rides in
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: old-fashioned spacers," he said. "Didn't you know what would happen?"
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: interne standing behind Kennon. "That will be all, Smalley," he said.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: However, I should have given her an injection of Somnol before we
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: started. I'm criminally liable. If anything happens to her--" His voice
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: was tight with worry.

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: that."

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: "What's a Lani?"

author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

text: she needs. She's a remarkably healthy young woman. But this is beside
title: The Lani People
author: Bone, Jesse F. (Jesse Franklin)

title: The Lani People
